markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Collateral Thrash](/Feats.aspx?ID=171) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 93 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Thrash](/Feats.aspx?ID=156)

</column>

---

When you [Thrash](/Feats.aspx?ID=156) a grabbed foe, you smack that foe into another nearby. Another foe adjacent to the grabbed foe also takes your Thrash damage, with a basic Reflex save against your class DC.

<title level="2">Collateral Thrash leads to...</title>
[Whirlwind Toss](/Feats.aspx?ID=2758)
name: Collateral Thrash
